jam.sort.stream
Class L003InputStream

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.InputStream
        |
        +--jam.sort.stream.EventInputStream
              |
              +--jam.sort.stream.L003InputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
L003Parameters
public class L003InputStream
extends EventInputStream
implements L003Parameters

This class knows how to handle Oak Ridge tape format (with special headers as used by Charles Barton's group). It extends EventInputStream, adding methods for reading events and returning them as int arrays which the sorter can handle.

Since:
JDK1.1
Version:
0.5 April 98
Author:
Dale Visser, Ken Swartz
See Also:
EventInputStream

Method Detail

readEvent

public EventInputStatus readEvent(int[] input)
                           throws EventException
Reads an event from the input stream. Expects the stream position to be the beginning of an event. It is up to the user to ensure this.
Overrides:
readEvent in class EventInputStream
Throws:
EventException - thrown for errors in the event stream
